thread.title: Which is a better place to live: Oregon or Washington? Poll
thread.title_full: Which is a better place to live: Oregon or Washington? Poll | OregonLive.com

author: Joseph Rose | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Which is a better place to live: Oregon or Washington? Poll
text:
On Thursday, I listed 11 reasons why Oregon is a better place to live than Washington in advance of the Oregon-Washington Pac-12 showdowns Saturday. The Ducks play the Huskies and the Beavers play the Cougars .
From coffee to sales tax, mountains to traffic, there was plenty of fodder. And plenty of reader feedback!
The Seattle Times responded Friday with their own 12 reasons why living in Washington is better than living in Oregon .
They appear to forfeit on the coffee, college football and "Goonies" vs. "Singles" challenges. And I'm surprised they didn't play the Pearl Jam and pro baseball cards.
Hey, at least we know how to dig a tunnel.
But readers get the last word. After reading both throwdowns, come back and vote:
Which is a better place to live: Oregon or Washington?
